statements: INSERT INTO solo_travel_safety_tips (tip_id, tip_description, precautions) VALUES (1, 'Keep your belongings safe at all times', 'Always keep your valuables secure and within reach.');
INSERT INTO solo_travel_safety_tips (tip_description, precautions, tip_id) VALUES ('Research your destination before you go', 'Know the local customs, laws, and potential risks.', 2);

INSERT INTO solo_travel_safety_tips (precautions, tip_id, tip_description) VALUES ('Share your itinerary with someone you trust', 3, 'Let someone know where you are going and when you plan to return.');
INSERT INTO solo_travel_safety_tips (tip_description, precautions, tip_id) VALUES ('Stay alert and aware of your surroundings', 'Be mindful of who is around you and avoid risky situations.', 4);
INSERT INTO solo_travel_safety_tips (precautions, tip_description, tip_id) VALUES ('Trust your instincts and intuition', 'If something feels off, remove yourself from the situation.', 5);
INSERT INTO solo_travel_safety_tips (tip_id, tip_description, precautions) VALUES (1, 'Always keep your belongings secure', 'Keep your valuables in a secure bag or hidden pouch.');
INSERT INTO solo_travel_safety_tips (tip_id, tip_description, precautions) VALUES (2, 'Research local customs before visiting', 'Be aware of cultural norms and etiquette of the destination.');
INSERT INTO solo_travel_safety_tips (tip_id, precautions, tip_description) VALUES (3, 'Stay connected with loved ones', 'Share your travel itinerary with family or friends.');
INSERT INTO solo_travel_safety_tips (tip_description, tip_id, precautions) VALUES ('Be cautious in unfamiliar areas', 4, 'Avoid exploring isolated or unsafe locations.');
INSERT INTO solo_travel_safety_tips (precautions, tip_id, tip_description) VALUES ('Carry copies of important documents', 5, 'Keep copies of passport and identification with you at all times.');
INSERT INTO travel_safety_tips (tip_id, tip_description, safety_level) VALUES (1, 'Keep your belongings secure at all times', 5);
